# nwn-dg

Work in progress: in alpha stage. Please refer to file POC.md for more information.

Neverwinter Nights (nwn) dungeon generator: cli & api.


## Installation

You can install the latest version from PyPI package repository.

~~~bash
pipx install nwn-dg
~~~
